statements: DELETE FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE total_cases > 100 AND recovery_rate < 0.5;
DELETE FROM Regions WHERE region_name = 'East Coast';
DELETE FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_id = 100 AND region_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Regions WHERE region_name = 'North Region' AND region_population > 1000000;
DELETE FROM response_efforts WHERE organization_name = 'Red Cross';
DELETE FROM regions WHERE country = 'USA' AND region_population < 1000000;
DELETE FROM responses WHERE response_type = 'Quarantine' AND response_date <= '2022-01-01';
